item.title: 辉瑞公司长期科学主管 Mikael Dolsten 将卸任
item.description: 辉瑞公司周二表示，该公司首席科学官 Mikael Dolsten 将卸任，他是该公司开发 COVID-19 疫苗的关键人物，在该制药公司工作了 15 年多。【原文：Pfizer said on Tuesday its chief scientific officer Mikael Dolsten, a key figure behind the development of the company's COVID-19 vaccine, would step down after a more than 15-year career at the drugmaker.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称诺镍公司正与中国铜业商谈将冶炼厂迁往中国事宜
item.description: 四位知情人士告诉路透社，诺尔尼克公司正在与中国铜业公司洽谈组建合资企业事宜，这将使这家俄罗斯矿业巨头能够将其整个铜冶炼基地迁往中国。【原文：Nornickel is in talks with China Copper to form a joint venture that would allow the Russian mining giant to move its entire copper smelting base to China, four sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 由于蔬菜价格飙升，印度 6 月份通胀率将有所上升：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，印度 6 月份的消费价格通胀率可能有所上升，结束了连续 5 个月的下降趋势，主要原因是极端天气对农作物造成的破坏导致蔬菜价格飙升。【原文：India consumer price inflation probably edged up in June, snapping five months of declines, largely because of a jump in vegetable prices caused by the damage to crops wrought by extreme weather, according to a Reuters poll of economists.】

item.title: 美国银行利润面临利息支付减少和信贷损失增加的压力
item.description: 分析师说，美国一些最大的银行第二季度的利润可能会有所下降，因为它们从利息支出中获得的收入减少了，并留出了更多的资金来弥补不断恶化的贷款。【原文：Some of the largest U.S. banks will probably report weaker profits for the second quarter as they earn less from interest payments and set aside more money to cover deteriorating loans, analysts said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话前，超级大盘股和芯片股上涨，期货走高
item.description: 美国股指期货周二上涨，大型科技股和半导体股将延续周一的涨势，因为投资者在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的证词，以寻找货币政策路径的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday, with megacap technology and semiconductor stocks set to prolong Monday's rally as investors waited to hear testimony from Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell for clues on the monetary policy path.】

item.title: 在奥运推动下，法国加大对假冒时尚的打击力度
item.description: 4 月 3 日黎明时分，在离法兰西体育场不远的旅游胜地圣旺跳蚤市场，警察一拥而入，查封了 11 家出售假冒箱包和鞋子的商店。【原文：In the touristy Saint-Ouen flea market, not far from the Stade de France where athletes will compete in this summer's Paris Olympics, police officers swarmed in at dawn on April 3 and shut down 11 stores selling counterfeit bags and shoes.】

item.title: 美国 6 月小型企业景气指数升至六个月高点
item.description: 美国小型企业的信心在 6 月份增至六个月来的最高点，但对通货膨胀的担忧依然存在，因为计划在未来三个月内提高工人报酬的企业主比例有所上升。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence increased to a six-month high in June, but inflation worries lingered amid a rise in the share of owners planning to raise compensation for workers over the next three months.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔在国会上可能会提出降息的理由
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周二将在参议院银行委员会作证，听证会可能会评估近期通胀放缓和美国就业市场放缓的迹象是否会促使央行加快其降息计划。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Tuesday testifies before the Senate Banking Committee in a hearing likely to take stock of whether recent signs of slowed inflation and a slowing U.S. job market will prompt the central bank to accelerate its plans to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 针对 Archegos 公司 Bill Hwang 的刑事案件在曼哈顿提交陪审团审理
item.description: 曼哈顿联邦法院的一个陪审团将于周二开始审议 Archegos Capital Management 创始人黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）的刑事案件，检方指控他在 2021 年其价值 360 亿美元的私人投资公司倒闭前操纵股价。【原文：A jury in federal court in Manhattan is set to begin deliberations on Tuesday in the criminal case against Archegos Capital Management founder Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang, accused by prosecutors of manipulating stock prices before the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion private investment firm.】

item.title: 早间竞价：目光转向通胀与大选，鲍威尔上台
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道美联储考虑调整规则，可为美国最大银行节省数十亿美元资本
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，美国联邦储备委员会正在考虑修改一项规则，这可能会为美国八大银行合计节省数十亿美元的资本，从而为该行业带来一场渴望已久的胜利。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is considering a rule change that could save the country's eight largest banks combined billions of dollars in capital, in a potential long-sought win for the industry, according to four people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州的石油公司在贝里尔飓风后恢复运营
item.description: 在飓风贝里尔以每小时 80 英里的风速袭击得克萨斯州，造成财产损失和数百万人停电之后，得克萨斯州的石油和天然气公司于周二重新开始运营。【原文：Oil and gas companies in Texas were restarting operations on Tuesday after Hurricane Beryl lashed the state with 80-mph winds, damaging property and leaving millions of people without power.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对约 94,000 辆吉普牧马人 4xe SUV 展开召回调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周二表示，美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）已开始对94275辆斯泰兰特吉普越野车的动力损失问题进行召回调查。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) has opened a recall query into 94,275 Stellantis-owned Jeep SUVs over a loss of motive power, the U.S. auto safety regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国监管机构称电动汽车制造商 Lucid 将召回 5,200 多辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，Lucid集团将召回5251辆Air豪华轿车。【原文：Lucid Group will recall 5,251 of its Air luxury sedans, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，菲斯科将因水泵问题召回约 7500 辆遨享电动 SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局表示，由于水泵问题可能导致动力损失，菲斯科将召回7545辆遨享电动SUV。【原文：Fisker is recalling 7,545 Ocean electric SUVs due to a water pump issue that could cause a loss of power, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said.】

item.title: 分析发现礼来药物减肥效果更佳后，诺和诺德股价下跌
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）是广受欢迎的肥胖症药物威戈维（Wegovy）的生产商，周二该公司股价下跌了1.1%，此前公布的一项数据分析显示，竞争对手礼来公司（Eli Lilly）自己的治疗药物Mounjaro能更快更大程度地减轻体重。【原文：Shares in Novo Nordisk , maker of the wildly popular obesity drug Wegovy, were down 1.1% on Tuesday after the publication of a data analysis showing rival Eli Lilly's own treatment Mounjaro leads to faster and greater weight loss.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选如何搅动拉美市场
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普有可能在 11 月重夺白宫，这让投资者为各种情况做好了准备，而 "美国后院 "则是最值得关注的市场之一。【原文：The possibility of former President Donald Trump winning back the White House in November has investors preparing for various scenarios, with "America's backyard" high on the list of markets to look out for.】

item.title: 亚洲投资者押注地区反弹和中国经济复苏
item.description: 亚洲的富豪及其银行家们表示，他们支持中国经济的最终复苏，并押注在这个即使在经济放缓时也是世界上增长最快的地区投资将获得回报。【原文：Asia's rich and their bankers said they are backing an eventual recovery in China and betting exposure to a region that even in a slowdown is the fastest-growing in the world will pay off.】

item.title: 台湾 6 月出口因人工智能需求超出预期，美国市场飙升
item.description: 台湾 6 月份的出口增幅超过预期，这得益于台湾是蓬勃发展的人工智能（AI）产业供应链中的关键一环，但同时也摆脱了低基期。【原文：Taiwan's exports rose more than expected in June, with the island benefiting from its position as a key link in the supply chain of the booming artificial intelligence (AI) industry though also coming off from a low base period.】

item.title: 以色列航空航天公司宣布与未具名第三方达成 10 亿美元交易
item.description: 以色列国有国防承包商以色列航空航天工业公司（IAI）（ISRAI.UL）周二表示，该公司已签订一份价值 10 亿美元的合同，向一家未具名的第三方供应其一套系统。【原文：Israel Aerospace Industries (IAI) (ISRAI.UL) has entered a $1 billion contract to supply one of its systems to an unnamed third party, the state-owned defence contractor said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行发布关于缩减债券计划的市场观点摘要
item.description: 日本央行周二公布了一份意见摘要，内容是在对债券市场参与者的调查中收集到的关于央行应如何缩减巨额债券购买的意见。【原文：The Bank of Japan on Tuesday released a summary of opinions it collected in a survey of bond market participants on how the central bank should taper its huge bond purchases.】

item.title: 德国商报》报道：德国上半年破产率高于预期
item.description: 据《德国商报》报道，今年上半年，德国破产的大中型企业数量比去年同期增加了 41%，原因是通货膨胀、成本上升和需求减弱。【原文：The number of medium-sized and large companies in Germany that went insolvent in the first half of this year was up 41% compared with the same period last year, the Handelsblatt daily reported, citing inflation, rising costs and weakening demand.】

item.title: 保时捷上半年交付量下降 7
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷周二表示，今年上半年全球汽车交付量与2023年同期相比下降了7%，原因是全球市场环境充满挑战，中国经济形势紧张。【原文：German sportscar maker Porsche said on Tuesday that global vehicle deliveries were down 7% in the first half of the year compared to the same period in 2023, citing a challenging global market environment and a tense economic situation in China.】

item.title: 中国 6 月新增人民币贷款因政策支持而激增
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，中国6月份新增人民币贷款可能比5月份翻了一番多，因为在经济复苏不稳的情况下，中国央行继续加大了对经济的政策支持力度。【原文：China's new yuan loans likely more than doubled in June from May, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday, as the central bank kept up policy support for the economy amid a shaky recovery.】

item.title: 淡马锡投资组合价值小幅增长；对中国持谨慎态度
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡周二表示，其投资组合净值已恢复增长，涨幅为1.8%，并补充说，在美国和印度的投资利润帮助缓解了中国市场表现不佳的影响。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek said on Tuesday its net portfolio value had swung back to growth with a 1.8% gain, adding that profits from investments in the United States and India helped cushion the impact of underperformance in China.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR 将减持日本切削工具制造商 Kokusai Electric 的股份
item.description: 私募股权公司 KKR 计划减持其在国际电气公司（Kokusai Electric）的股份，两位熟悉内情的人士称，在这家日本芯片设备制造商的股价大涨之后，KKR 计划套现。【原文：Private equity firm KKR plans to cut its stake in Kokusai Electric , two people familiar with the matter said, cashing in after a blistering run for shares in the Japanese chip equipment maker.】

item.title: 迪斯尼将在东京增加新船以扩大游轮业务
item.description: 华特迪士尼周二公布了推出新游轮的计划，新游轮将于 2028 财年从东京启航，为该品牌不断壮大的船队增添第九艘游轮。【原文：Walt Disney unveiled plans on Tuesday to launch a new cruise ship that will set sail from Tokyo starting in fiscal 2028, adding a ninth vessel to the brand's growing fleet.】

item.title: Meta 和沃达丰优化视频以提高网络效率
item.description: Instagram 的所有者 Meta 与沃达丰合作，在不明显影响观看体验的情况下优化了短视频的传输，从而释放了其 11 个欧洲移动网络的容量。【原文：Instagram-owner Meta has worked with Vodafone to free up capacity on 11 of its European mobile networks by optimising the delivery of short-form video without noticeably compromising the viewing experience.】

item.title: 新交所首席执行官表示，目前没有允许加密货币上市的计划
item.description: 新加坡交易所（SGX）首席执行官罗文财（Loh Boon Chye）周二表示，新加坡交易所（SGX）目前还没有允许加密货币在其交易所上市的计划，并补充说，采取这一举措的条件还不成熟。【原文：Singapore Exchange (SGX) has no immediate plans to allow cryptocurrency listings on its bourse, CEO Loh Boon Chye said on Tuesday, adding that conditions are still not ripe for such a move.】

item.title: Stellantis 将扩大混合动力汽车产品线以满足日益增长的需求
item.description: Stellantis 周二表示，到 2026 年，该公司将在欧洲把经济型混合动力汽车产品线扩展到 36 种车型，以满足对这种发动机类型日益增长的需求。【原文：Stellantis said on Tuesday it would expand its line of affordable hybrid vehicles to 36 models in Europe by 2026, to meet growing demand for this engine type, an alternative to petrol-fuelled cars and electric vehicles.】
